text: Good learner book for a 12 year old?
My 12 year old brother has recently expressed an interest in learning to program.
I of course think this is a great idea, why not start him early?
I'm wondering what you guys think with regards a book?
I was thinking I should start him off on Java but I'm unsure what book would be best?
Any suggestions with regards a book or even another language would be much appreciated.
UPDATE: I've went with Python and I'm starting him off with "Snake wrangling for kids".
